page.title: 13A DAY IN THE LIFE OF MATTHEW
page.content: There's time for a quick game of football in the playground. Nine o'clock - in we go and have an Assembly to start the day. Yesterday we went on a country walk and we have work to do about it today. We saw many animals so we have to draw and write about them, using library books for reference. The main birds we saw were ducks and lots of garden birds but I liked the sparrowhawk best. Ten forty - break time. We usually play bulldog or football. Bulldog is a fast game, e.g. Steven is IT and people on one side have to run to the other without being touched by Steven. We're back in at eleven and we are doing maths for the rest of the morning. I like maths - it is interesting. Some of my friends are on our school computer.
